about_the_game:
『OGWorld』
– An Unprecedented Multidimensional Adventure Where an Old Guy Saves the World!

The protagonist is a 50-year-old bald otaku.

One day, his precious collection of beautiful girl figurines is stolen!

Teaming up with his fairy companion—another Old Guy, he embarks on an interdimensional journey to reclaim what was taken from him.

＜Explore Various Alternate Dimensions＞

Travel across multiple dimensions!
Explore post-apocalyptic wastelands, deep-sea ruins, pyramids, Japanese castles, Shinjuku, New York, dark caves, fantasy worlds, futuristic sci-fi cities, outer space, and eerie haunted mansions.

Climb higher and higher!

＜Catch and Train OGmons!＞

Wild Old Guys (OGmons) roam the land—drunk, reckless, and out of control.
Subdue them and capture them using the OG Ball! (Captured OGmons are crushed inside the ball and then revived using their DNA and memories.)
Once captured, OGmons become your allies, assisting you in battles and even labor.

＜The Floating Phenomenon＞

A strange event known as the "Floating Phenomenon" is affecting the world, causing objects and people to float uncontrollably, making daily life nearly impossible.

However, the protagonist is the only one unaffected by this phenomenon!
Use this unique ability to experience a one-of-a-kind gameplay mechanic where "one Old Guy carries another Old Guy."

Experience new and innovative action like never before!

＜Diverse Enemies and Giant Bosses!＞

Throughout your interdimensional journey, you'll encounter bizarre foes and enormous bosses standing in your way.
Fight alongside OGmons and take on wild and wacky action-packed battles!

Add to Your Wishlist Now!

With laughter, emotional moments, and pure absurdity, this adventure will take you on an unforgettable journey with an Old Guy by your side.

—Your gateway to the Old Guy adventure is just a click away!

name: OG World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10/11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster multi-core processor
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070

short_description: 『OGWorld』 is a wild action-adventure where a 50-year-old bald otaku, Snark, travels across dimensions to reclaim his stolen figurines. Add to your wishlist and join this bizarre adventure!
